mapper.select: SELECT notice_no AS noticeNo, notice_title AS noticeTitle, notice_date AS noticeDate, admin_name AS adminName FROM mini_market_notice WHERE (notice_title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchWord}, '%') OR notice_content LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchWord}, '%')) ORDER BY notice_no DESC LIMIT #{beginRow}, #{rowPerPage}

SELECT no.notice_no AS noticeNo, no.notice_title AS noticeTitle, no.notice_content AS noticeContent, no.notice_date AS noticeDate, no.admin_name AS adminName FROM mini_market_notice AS no WHERE no.notice_no = #{noticeNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mini_market_notice ( notice_title, notice_content, notice_date, admin_name ) VALUES ( #{noticeTitle}, #{noticeContent}, NOW(), #{adminName} )
mapper.update: UPDATE mini_market_notice SET notice_title = #{noticeTitle}, notice_content = #{noticeContent}, notice_date = NOW() WHERE notice_no = #{noticeNo}
